results.title: Chemoprevention in oral leukoplakia: challenges and current landscape
results.text_hl: Gutkind et al. conducted a phase IIa clinical trial in individuals with @<m>DISEASE_Leukoplakia_Oral</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007972 @@@OL@@@ and @DISEASE_Dyskinesias @DISEASE_MESH:D020820 @@@oral erythroplakia@@@ to evaluate @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s potential to target @GENE_PIK3CD @GENE_5293 @@@PI3K@@@/@GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@ signaling for @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@MT@@@ prevention.

citations.NLM: Palma VM, Koerich Laureano N, Frank LA, Rados PV, Visioli F. Chemoprevention in oral leukoplakia: challenges and current landscape Front Oral Health. 2023;4():1191347. PMID: 37293562
